description: OpenBlock Labs standard schema for derivatives protocols (options and perps).

tables.label: Pools
tables.description: Pools in the protocol (one entry for each token).

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block the pool was created on.

creation_block_number.description: The block number this pool was created on.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

pool_name.description: The name of the pool (ie, name() in the smart contract).

token_index.description: The index of the token in the smart contract (one row for each token in a pool).

token_address.description: The contract address of the token.

tables.label: LP Snapshot
tables.description: Liquidity providers snapshot (one entry for each token in a pool).

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

lp_address.description: The address of the liquidity provider.

token_index.description: The index of the token in the smart contract.

token_address.description: The address of the token provided as liquidity.

deposit_amount.description: (Optional, for Order Books) The amount deposited into the pool, decimal normalized.

deposit_amount_usd.description: (Optional, for Order Books) The amount deposited, in USD.

amount_useful.description: (Optional, for LPs) The amount of tokens supplied that are liquid and usable by users of the protocol, decimal normalized.

amount_useful_usd.description: (Optional, for LPs) The amount of liquid tokens supplied in USD.

liquidated_amount.description: The amount of tokens liquidated from the LP, decimal normalized.

total_fees_usd.description: (Optional) All fees generated by the LP in the given snapshot in USD.

user_fees_usd.description: (Optional) The portion of fees accrued to users of the protocol, in USD.

protocol_fees_usd.description: (Optional) The portion of fees accrued to the protocol, in USD.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

pool_address.description: The smart contract address of the pool.

token_index.description: The index of the token in the smart contract (one row for each token in a pool).

funding_rate.description: The funding rate in this pool at the time of the snapshot, as a percentage.

fee_rate.description: he pool's fee rate, as a percentage.

total_value_locked_usd.description: The total value locked in USD.

volume_usd.description: The volume of positions opened and closed in the given snapshot in USD.

open_interest_longs_usd.description: The sum of open interest of longs held within this pool in USD.

open_interest_shorts_usd.description: The sum of open interest in shorts held within this pool in USD.

tables.label: Trades
tables.description: Trade data, 1 entry for each close, open, or update of a trade.

transaction_hash.description: The hash of the transaction this trade was performed in.

block_number.description: The block number of the trade.

pool_address.description: The address of the pool this token was traded in.

amount.description: The value that a trader is putting to open a long or short, decimal normalized.

notional_value.description: The value of the leveraged amount of the trade, decimal normalized.

maker_pnl_usd.description: (Only applicable on trade close) The total profit and loss of the trade on the maker's side, in USD.

taker_pnl_usd.description: (Only applicable on trade close) The total profit and loss of the trade on the taker's side, in USD.

trade_action.description: The action of trade being recorded in this entry (ie, OPEN, CLOSE, INCREASE, DECREASE, LIQUIDATED).

trade_type.description: The type of the trade being recorded in this entry (ie, LONG, SHORT).

tables.label: Incentive Claim Data
tables.description: Transactional data on user level incentives claimed data.

log_index.description: The event log. For transactions that don't emit event, create arbitrary index starting from 0.

transaction_signer.description: The address of the account that signed the transaction.

user_address.description: The address of the user who claimed the incentives (could be different from the transaction_signer).

claimed_token_address.description: The smart contract address of the claimed token.

amount.description: The amount of the token claimed, decimal normalized.

amount_usd.description: The amount of claimed tokens in USD.

other_incentive_usd.description: (Optional) Any incentives outside of the claimed token, in this transaction, summed up in USD terms.

description: OpenBlock Labs standard schema for derivatives protocols (AMM Perps with vault).

tables.label: Pairs Snapshot
tables.description: Pairs traded in the protocol (one entry for each pair).

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block the pair was created on.

creation_block_number.description: The block number this pair was created on.

pair_name.description: The name of the pool (ie, name() in the contract).

pair_index.description: The index of the token in the contract.

pair_address.description: The contract address of the pair.

pair_liquidity.description: The liquidity (24h rolling average, in tokens).

pair_liquidity_usd.description: The liquidity (24h rolling average, in USD).

volume_usd.description: Volume opened/closed in snapshot (24h rolling average, USD).

open_interest_longs_usd.description: Sum of open interest of longs, USD.

open_interest_shorts_usd.description: Sum of open interest of shorts, USD.

liquidation_fees_usd.description: Total liquidation fees (24h rolling average, USD).

funding_rate.description: Funding rate at snapshot, as a percentage.

open_fees_usd.description: Total open fees (24h rolling average, USD).

close_fees_usd.description: Total close fees (24h rolling average, USD).

tables.label: LP Snapshots AMM Perps
tables.description: Liquidity providers snapshot (one entry for each token in a vault).

lp_address.description: The address of the liquidity provider.

token_index.description: The index of the token in the contract.

token_address.description: The token address provided as liquidity.

amount_useful.description: Amount of tokens supplied by LP that are liquid and usable.

liquidity_change_amount.description: Tokens lost or gained by the LP, decimal normalized.

liquidity_amount_usd.description: Value lost or gained by the LP, in USD.

total_lp_fees_usd.description: Total fees for the LP at snapshot (USD).

vault_address.description: The contract address of the vault.

token_index.description: The index of the token in the contract.

liquidity_available_usd.description: (Optional) Total liquidity available for trading, USD.

open_interest_longs_usd.description: (Optional) Aggregate open long positions backed by vault, USD.

open_interest_shorts_usd.description: (Optional) Aggregate open short positions backed by vault, USD.

volume_usd.description: Volume of trades in snapshot (24h rolling avg), USD.

vault_fees_usd.description: Fees accrued by the protocol (24h rolling avg), USD.

tables.label: Trades AMM Perps
tables.description: Trade data, 1 entry for each close, open, or update of a trade in AMM Perps.

transaction_hash.description: The hash of the transaction this trade was performed in.

block_number.description: The block number of the trade.

pool_address.description: The address of the pool this token was traded in.

pair_index.description: The index of the pair that is traded.

amount.description: Collateral used to open the position, decimal normalized.

notional_value.description: The leveraged value of the trade, decimal normalized.

open_interest_longs_usd.description: Open interest of longs held by the trader at snapshot, USD.

open_interest_shorts_usd.description: Open interest of shorts held by the trader at snapshot, USD.

taker_pnl_usd.description: (On trade close) PnL for the taker in USD.

tables.label: Incentive Claim Data AMM Perps
tables.description: User-level incentives claimed data for AMM Perps.

log_index.description: Event log index (for tx with no event, start at 0).

transaction_signer.description: The address of the account that signed the transaction.

user_address.description: The address of the user who claimed the incentives.

amount.description: The amount of the token claimed, decimal normalized.

amount_usd.description: The amount of claimed tokens in USD.
